CustomField.description: Fee to file policies SL policies with InsCipher. As of 6/12/23 we are not charging the $79 fee.
CustomField.formula: IF( AND( Premium__c > 0, NOT(OR(RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Scale_Received', RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Scale_Locked', RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Scale_Open')), Surplus_Lines_Quote__c = TRUE, DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) <= DATEVALUE("2023-06-12")), 79, 0)
CustomField.label: State Filing Fee
